ygData.subject: Re: mip = many innapropriate pictures?
ygData.msgSnippet: So it seems like the only reason to ever use GLIDE would be to allow tweaking of  Gamma in Game?  Why would anyone want to use it? Slyde ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
So it seems like the only reason to ever use GLIDE would be to allow
tweaking of Gamma in Game? Why would anyone want to use it?

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 28, 2000 12:27 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] mip = many innapropriate pictures?


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 28 Feb 2000, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
> >
> > I've found that to be true. The advantage of Glide is that you can
tweak
> > the gamma to brighten things up...
>
> The Voodoo3 drivers as of about December have options to let
> you tweak the gamma for Direct3D, Glide, and OpenGL
> modes. You can't do it in the game, but you can spend about
> 10 minutes hopping in and out of the game to tweak it. Then
> you're set.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
